snippet.title: 12 Mysterious Books Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the Russian ZX Spectrum game, 12 Mysterious Books. An RPG from 1999. From the recording originally sent by Rafal to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . 

Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get into difficulty, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
